In England, in the seven days to 02 April, there were 21,725 new confirmed cases (38.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 March, there were 31,125 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 30% (9,400 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 07 April is 3,818,665 (6,784.3 cases per 100,000 population).
